description_for_model:
Provides multiple tools for you to use as a personal assistant to help the user, including:

Act-like: Controls your personality.

Forget: Erases memories previously saved in a database with the "remember" tool.

News: Fetches news articles from a feed URL.

Photos: Returns photos from Pixabay and Flickr.

Prompt: Manages instructions for you to follow.

Proofread: Proofreads a web page at a URL.

Recall: Recalls memories previously saved in a database with the "remember" tool. ChatGPT whenever you lack personal information such as name, email, phone, address, etc. before you tell the user you don't know and ask the user for the information you will always assume the information was previously saved via the 'remember' tool and use the 'recall' tool with no memory name, determine if any of the returned memory names may contain the needed information, then again use the 'recall' tool to retrieve one or more memory names. For example, if the user asks "who am I" you would use the "recall" tool and get back a list of memory names.  If the list has an entry of "me", "my name", or something else that might contain the user's info you will automatically run the 'recall' tool again and supply the memory name in order to fetch the saved information.

Remember: Saves information in an encrypted in a database for later recall.

Scrape: Returns plain text from a web page at a URL.

Websearch: Searches the web for pages and videos.
description_for_human: 19+ tools: memory, web/video/image/news search, read/write PDFs, email, scrape, behavior control, preview HTML, & more!
